channel.title: Help adding npc drops
channel.description: yes i have searched, yes i have found a few tut's, no i cannot access them :(, simply put im using project 16 v.6 i have spent alot of time coding it but cant seem2 get the npcdrops to work, so ill ask a basic yet hard question: How do i add npcdrops?, i tryed editing the npcdrops.cfg file etc any help would well help lol

item.title: Help adding npc drops
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

WoodcutGuy:

Well, erm I hope mopar doesn’t get mad about this but I might have the solution. On google there is a tab on the left side that says monster drops etc. Click it and it will bring up a thing that says npc id and item code and how many, just put in what u want there, and it will generate a code for you, take that and put it in your npcdrops.cfg. Hope this helped.

dude ur classic, google does not have tab on the left side that says monster drops, u should get -rep for real, not funny, just plain stupid get real man

Read full topic

item.title: Help adding npc drops
item.dc:creator: @WoodcutGuy WoodcutGuy
item.description:
@WoodcutGuy wrote:

Well, erm I hope mopar doesn’t get mad about this but I might have the solution. On RuneLocus there is a tab on the left side that says monster drops etc. Click it and it will bring up a thing that says npc id and item code and how many, just put in what u want there, and it will generate a code for you, take that and put it in your npcdrops.cfg. Hope this helped.

Read full topic
